name: Robert Bosch Power Tools GmbH
goal: Robert Bosch Power Tools GmbH is one of the world’s leading providers for power tools, power tool accessories, garden tools and measuring tools. It has a workforce of some 20,000 associates in 62 countries (March 2018). With brands such as Bosch and Dremel, the company stands for customer focus and great engineering progress. The core success factors are innovative strength and pace of innovation. Since 2017 as Robert Bosch Power Tools GmbH 100 percent owned by Bosch Group.
interests: Climate Action, Consumers, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, External Relations, Public Health, Research and innovation, Trade
euInitiatives:
Energy Efficency, Ecodesign, Resource Efficiency, Circular Economy Package, Waste and WEEE legislation,
Substance and materials regulation, Market Surveillance Regulation, Product Safety, Consumer Policy, Digital Single
Market, Digitising Industry, Cybersecurity, Horizon 2020
